97.movie_plot: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding an American General prisoner... but that's not all that's really going on.

82.movie_plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

93.movie_plot: Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.

80.movie_name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)
80.movie_plot: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

99.movie_plot: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

90.movie_plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

101.movie_plot: Tromaville has a monstrous new hero. The Toxic Avenger is born when meek mop boy Melvin falls into a vat of toxic waste. Now evildoers will have a lot to lose.

91.movie_plot: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

102.movie_plot: Capt. Jim Gordon's command of the famed American mercenary fighter group in China is complicated by the recruitment of an old friend who is a reckless hotshot.

92.movie_plot: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

84.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

96.movie_plot: Former Green Beret John Rambo is pursued into the mountains surrounding a small town by a tyrannical sheriff and his deputies, forcing him to survive using his combat skills.

100.movie_plot: A San Francisco civilian police detective is forced to work on a series of murders with his former enemy commanding officer while dating his daughter.

87.movie_plot: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

81.movie_plot: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.

103.movie_plot: Whitley Strieber goes with his family and some friends to his holiday home in the forest. They experience some weird occurances, are they UFO activity? Whitley is abducted and then faces a ...

94.movie_plot: An All-American trucker gets dragged into a centuries-old mystical battle in Chinatown.

86.movie_plot: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

85.movie_plot: Agent 007 is assigned to hunt for a lost British encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

83.movie_plot: A man who works for 'The Party' (an all powerful empire led by a man known only as 'Big Brother') begins to have thoughts of rebellion and love for a fellow member. Together they look to help bring down the party.

104.movie_name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes (1972)
104.movie_plot: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.

89.movie_plot: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

88.movie_plot: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

95.movie_plot: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

106.movie_plot: A hard-nosed, hard-living Marine gunnery sergeant clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.

105.movie_plot: A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town.

98.movie_plot: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

69.movie_plot: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

50.movie_plot: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled on a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

54.movie_plot: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

4.movie_plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

20.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

58.movie_plot: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as dark forces conspire to tear it apart.

29.movie_plot: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save his wife Holly Gennaro and several others that were taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

41.movie_plot: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

79.movie_plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.

2.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)
2.movie_plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

49.movie_plot: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them, while the Catwoman has her own agenda.

77.movie_plot: A race of space vampires arrive in London and infect the populace.

22.movie_plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

12.movie_plot: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

45.movie_plot: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

26.movie_plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

18.movie_plot: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

63.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

25.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

34.movie_plot: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

30.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

3.movie_plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

32.movie_name: Good, The Bad and The Ugly, The (1966)
32.movie_plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

28.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

0.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

44.movie_plot: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

76.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

55.movie_plot: A veteran policeman, Murtaugh, is partnered with a younger, suicidal officer, Riggs. They both have one thing in common: hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.

31.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

60.movie_name: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
60.movie_plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

68.movie_plot: Humans in a fascistic, militaristic future do battle with giant alien bugs in a fight for survival.

67.movie_name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970)
67.movie_plot: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

37.movie_plot: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

61.movie_plot: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

9.movie_plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

38.movie_plot: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

66.movie_plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

13.movie_plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

56.movie_plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

1.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

6.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
6.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

72.movie_plot: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

52.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

33.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

19.movie_plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

16.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)
16.movie_plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

47.movie_plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

5.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

14.movie_plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

43.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

51.movie_plot: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

74.movie_plot: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

27.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
27.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

15.movie_plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

78.movie_plot: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

8.movie_plot: When a Roman General is betrayed, and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

42.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

21.movie_plot: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

70.movie_plot: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

35.movie_plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

10.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

7.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

24.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

59.movie_plot: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

48.movie_plot: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.

65.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

40.movie_plot: Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

53.movie_plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

62.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

23.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

75.movie_plot: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

11.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

71.movie_plot: An idyllic sci-fi future has one major drawback: life must end at the age of 30.

46.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
46.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

17.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
17.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

39.movie_plot: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine - the Mob - track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

73.movie_plot: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery.

57.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

64.movie_plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

36.movie_plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.
